title: Aromatherapy Workshop Series — Nourish and Breathe, Naturopath and Apothecary
description: Our Certified Aromatherapist, Kirsten Gray, is excited to share a new workshop series starting 27th Feb. Kirsten offers monthly workshops on a variety of topics from Introduction to Essential Oils, The Art of Blending, Managing Mood & Emotions and Botanical Perfumery. The make +
